tweet_text: In 1999, there were still 59 countries where mothers and newborns risked tetanus. Today, with strong tetanus vaccine programs, 46 have eliminated that risk. 13 countries still working hard to protect every mother, every child From tetanus. #TBT #vaccineswork https://t.co/fSfst8jQ87
